languages.text: Шахты Веабоса-6 становились все глубже, и скоро планета стала самой мрачной и пугающей колонией Простора, местом последней ссылки проклятых. Жестокие, закаленные обитатели мира смерти не боялись ни людей, ни ксеноужасов, не ведали милости и слыли самыми жуткими бойцами сектора, оплачивающими смертью право покинуть темные шахты.

The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xenohorrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.
languages.original_text: Шахты Веабоса-6 становились все глубже, и скоро планета стала самой мрачной и пугающей колонией Простора, местом последней ссылки проклятых. Жестокие, закаленные обитатели мира смерти не боялись ни людей, ни ксеноужасов, не ведали милости и слыли самыми жуткими бойцами сектора, оплачивающими смертью право покинуть темные шахты.

traits.locale_text: The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xeno-horrors, knew no mercy and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xeno-horrors, knew no mercy and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xeno-horrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xeno-horrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xenohorrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

languages.text: 维博斯六号星的矿井越挖越深。很快，这颗行星就变成了整个科罗努斯扩区最黑暗、最可怕的殖民地，也是那些被放逐者与被诅咒者的最后一站。这个死亡世界成为了无数凶狠而刚毅的居民的家园，他们既不惧怕人类，也不惧怕可怕的异形。他们对待一切都毫不留情，所有人都认为他们是这片星区最可怕的战士。他们靠着出卖自己的性命，换取彻底离开黑暗矿井的权利。
languages.original_text: The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xenohorrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

traits.locale_text: 维博斯六号星的矿井越挖越深。很快，这颗行星就变成了整个科罗努斯扩区最黑暗、最可怕的殖民地，也是那些被放逐者与被诅咒者的最后一站。这个死亡世界成为了无数凶狠而刚毅的居民的家园，他们既不惧怕人类，也不惧怕可怕的异形。他们对待一切都毫不留情，所有人都认为他们是这片星区最可怕的战士。他们靠着出卖自己的性命，换取彻底离开黑暗矿井的权利。

languages.text: ヴィアボス・VIの採掘坑はどんどん深くなっていき、すぐにそこはエクスパンスで最も闇が深く恐ろしいコロニー、国を追われた者と呪われし者の終着地点となった。死地惑星の凶悪でタフな住人は、人類も異種族もホラーも恐れることはなく、また慈悲もなく、セクターで最も恐ろしいファイターとして知られていた。彼らは採掘坑の永遠の闇から逃れるために自分の命を犠牲にした。
languages.original_text: The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xenohorrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

traits.locale_text: ヴィアボス・VIの採掘坑はどんどん深くなっていき、すぐにそこはエクスパンスで最も闇が深く恐ろしいコロニー、国を追われた者と呪われし者の終着地点となった。死地惑星の凶悪でタフな住人は、人類も異種族もホラーも恐れることはなく、また慈悲もなく、セクターで最も恐ろしいファイターとして知られていた。彼らは採掘坑の永遠の闇から逃れるために自分の命を犠牲にした。

languages.text: Les mines de Vhéabos-VI s'enfoncèrent toujours plus sous la surface, et la planète devint bientôt la colonie la plus sombre et la plus terrifiante des Étendues, servant de dernière étape aux exilés et aux damnés. Les habitants endurcis et brutaux du monde hostile ne craignaient ni les humains ni les xéno-horreurs, ne connaissaient pas la pitié et étaient réputés comme les plus redoutables combattants du secteur, qui avaient échangé leur vie contre le droit de quitter les ténèbres éternelles des mines.
languages.original_text: The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xenohorrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

traits.locale_text: Les mines de Vhéabos-VI s'enfoncèrent toujours plus sous la surface, et la planète devint bientôt la colonie la plus sombre et la plus terrifiante des Étendues, servant de dernière étape aux exilés et aux damnés. Les habitants endurcis et brutaux du monde hostile ne craignaient ni les humains ni les xéno-horreurs, ne connaissaient pas la pitié et étaient réputés comme les plus redoutables combattants du secteur, qui avaient échangé leur vie contre le droit de quitter les ténèbres éternelles des mines.

languages.text: Las minas de Vheabos VI se volvieron cada vez más profundas, y pronto el planeta se convirtió en la colonia más oscura y aterradora de la Extensión; la última parada para los exiliados y los condenados. Los habitantes duros y curtidos del mundo letal no sentían miedo ni hacia los humanos ni hacia los horrores xenos, no conocían la clemencia y se ganaron la fama de ser los guerreros más temibles del sector, que entregaban sus vidas a cambio del derecho a abandonar la oscuridad eterna de las minas.
languages.original_text: The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xenohorrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

traits.locale_text: Las minas de Vheabos VI se volvieron cada vez más profundas, y pronto el planeta se convirtió en la colonia más oscura y aterradora de la Extensión; la última parada para los exiliados y los condenados. Los habitantes duros y curtidos del mundo letal no sentían miedo ni hacia los humanos ni hacia los horrores xenos, no conocían la clemencia y se ganaron la fama de ser los guerreros más temibles del sector, que entregaban sus vidas a cambio del derecho a abandonar la oscuridad eterna de las minas.

languages.text: Die Minen von Vheabos VI wurden immer tiefer, und schon bald war der Planet die dunkelste und furchteinflößendste Kolonie der Ausdehnung, der letzte Halt für die Verbannten und Verdammten. Die brutalen, gestählten Einwohner der Todeswelt fürchteten weder Menschen noch Xeno-Schrecken, kannten keine Gnade und galten als die schrecklichsten Kämpfer im Sektor, die ihr Leben gegen das Recht eingetauscht hatten, die ewige Dunkelheit der Minen zu verlassen.
languages.original_text: The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xenohorrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

traits.locale_text: Die Minen von Vheabos VI wurden immer tiefer, und schon bald war der Planet die dunkelste und furchteinflößendste Kolonie der Ausdehnung, der letzte Halt für die Verbannten und Verdammten. Die brutalen, gestählten Einwohner der Todeswelt fürchteten weder Menschen noch Xeno-Schrecken, kannten keine Gnade und galten als die schrecklichsten Kämpfer im Sektor, die ihr Leben gegen das Recht eingetauscht hatten, die ewige Dunkelheit der Minen zu verlassen.

languages.text: Vheabos VI'nin madenleri daha da derinlere ulaştı ve gezegen; çok geçmeden Enginlik'teki en karanlık ve en korkutucu koloni oldu, sürgünlerin ve lanetlilerin son durağına dönüştü. Ölüm dünyasında yaşayan vahşi ve sert halk; ne insanlardan ne de zenodehşetlerden korkuyor, merhamet nedir bilmiyor ve madenlerin sonsuz karanlığından çıkma hakkı uğruna hayatlarını satmış, sektördeki en korkutucu savaşçılar olarak tanınıyordu.
languages.original_text: The mines of Vheabos VI grew deeper and deeper, and soon the planet became the darkest and most frightening colony of the Expanse, the final stop for the exiled and the damned. The brutal, hardened inhabitants of the death world feared neither humans nor xenohorrors, knew no mercy, and were known as the most fearsome fighters in the sector, who had traded their lives for the right to leave the eternal darkness of the mines.

traits.locale_text: Vheabos VI madenleri derinleştikçe derinleşti ve gezegen çok geçmeden Enginlik'teki en karanlık ve en korkutucu koloni, sürülmüşlerin ve lanetlenmişlerin son durağı hâline geldi. Ölüm dünyasında yaşayan vahşi ve sert halk ne insanlardan ne de zenodehşetlerden korkuyor, merhamet nedir bilmiyor ve madenlerin sonsuz karanlığından çıkma hakkı uğruna yaşamlarını satmış, sektördeki en korkutucu savaşçılar olarak tanınıyorlardı.
